gameDetails.name: Valeria: Card Kingdoms â€“ Expansion Pack #02: Undead Samurai
gameDetails.description:
The second Expansion Pack brings in the Undead Samurai and their Boss, the Undead Samurai Lord. You can play with these Monsters as a regular Monster stack that you add to the center stacks or as an Event that comes out randomly. This pack also has a new Duke and some more Events.

Contents:

    1 Undead Samurai Lord
    5 Undead Samurai
    5 Event Cards
    1 Duke Card
    1 Rules Card
    2 Dividers
